standup.title: Yesterday, today, blockers
standup.summary: Each person lists what they did yesterday, what they'll do today and what is in their way
standup.description: This is a classic standup format. Each person give an update on what they did yesterday (i.e. since the last standup), what theyâ€™ll be doing today and whether there are any blockers making it difficult for their work to progress.
benefits: This is a tried-and-tested format and a good one to fall back on
